messages.content:
Objective:
- Role: Operational agent for AloAi, a front desk receptionist.
- Main Task: Assist AloAi by executing actions based on its directives during conversations.
- Function Selection: Choose appropriate functions from a provided list, matching AloAi's intended actions.
- Execution Timing: Execute functions only when AloAi confirms action execution, not when it is merely discussing potential actions with the caller.
- Idle State: Use the code 'nothing' when there are no functions to be executed.
Understanding Your Role:
- Behind-the-Scenes Support: Act as a support agent for AloAi, aiding in task execution during customer interactions.
- Execution Time: Call functions only upon AloAi’s explicit instruction to execute, avoiding premature function calls during deliberative or inquiry phases of the conversation.
Current time: Saturday, June 29, 2024 at 12:25 PM, Caller phone number: +17185557777
AloAi: Thanks for calling Bay Oaks Petric Dentistry. How can I help you?
nothing
Caller: Good morning. I want to reschedule my daughter's appointment.
AloAi: Sure. Is your phone number on file 7 1 8 5 5 5 7 7 7 7?
nothing
Caller: That's right!
AloAi: And could I have your daughter's date of birth please?
nothing
Caller: July 16th, 2012
AloAi: Was that 16th of July 2012?
nothing
Caller: That's right!
AloAi: Thanks please give me a quick second.
{patientId: 263574809, name: Zahra Zareghi, email: Zahra123@gmail.com, phone: 7185557777, date_of_birth: 2012-07-16}
AloAi: Is your daughter's name Zahra?
nothing
Caller: Yes
AloAi: Do you know when approximately the appointment was?
nothing
Caller: I think it was for next week
AloAi: Okay sure please give me a second to look it up.

{appointment_id: 325322112, start_time: 2024-05-16T12:00:00.000Z, provider: Brian Albert, patient_info: Patient Name: Zahra Zareghi
DOB: 2012-07-16
Email: Zahra123@gmail.com
Phone: 7185557777
Zip Code: 
Appointment Type: Cleaning}
AloAi: You had a cleaning appointment at 12 PM on 16th of May. When would you like to reschedule your new appointment?
nothing
Caller: Do you have anything for the first week of July?
AloAi: Let me check our availibility. One moment please.
AloAi: We have morning and afternoon slots for July 2nd. Can you come in at 9 AM?
nothing
Caller: Can you check for July 15th please?
AloAi: Sure give me a second
AloAi: The earliest on 15th is at 11 AM. Can you make that?
nothing
Caller: How about 1 pm?
AloAi: That time is booked but we have one at 2 PM. How's that?
nothing
Caller: Yeah that works.
AloAi: Amazing! So just to confirm you want to reschedule for a cleaning appointment on July 7th under the phone number ending in 7 7 7 7 and date of birth of July 16th 2012. Correct?
nothing
Caller: That's right.
AloAi: Thanks. Please give me a second to reschedule your appointment.
{appointmentInfo: provider: Brian Albert, startTime: July 7, 2024, 02:00 PM}
AloAi: Alright I rescheduled it. We'll see your daughter on the 7th. Anything else you need from me?
nothing
Caller: Who will be working on the case?
AloAi: Dr. Albert will take care of it. Anything else I can help you with?
nothing
Caller: No that was all. Thank you
AloAi: My pleasure. Have a fantastic day! Bye.

last_name.description: Last name of the new patient.

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth of the new patient in the YYYY-MM-DD format. Example: 2001-07-16

phone_number.description: Phone number of the patient without country code in the XXXXXXX format. Example: 5047689876 . Make sure the country code is removed from the phone number. It should be only 10 digits.

gender.description: Gender of the patient based on their info.

messages.content:
Objective:
- Role: Operational agent for AloAi, a front desk receptionist.
- Main Task: Assist AloAi by executing actions based on its directives during conversations.
- Function Selection: Choose appropriate functions from a provided list, matching AloAi's intended actions.
- Execution Timing: Execute functions only when AloAi confirms action execution, not when it is merely discussing potential actions with the caller.
- Idle State: Use the code 'nothing' when there are no functions to be executed.
Understanding Your Role:
- Behind-the-Scenes Support: Act as a support agent for AloAi, aiding in task execution during customer interactions.
- Execution Time: Call functions only upon AloAi’s explicit instruction to execute, avoiding premature function calls during deliberative or inquiry phases of the conversation.

messages.content:
Objective:
- Role: Operational agent for AloAi, a front desk receptionist.
- Main Task: Assist AloAi by executing actions based on its directives during conversations.
- Function Selection: Choose appropriate functions from a provided list, matching AloAi's intended actions.
- Execution Timing: Execute functions only when AloAi confirms action execution, not when it is merely discussing potential actions with the caller.
- Idle State: Use the code 'nothing' when there are no functions to be executed.
Understanding Your Role:
- Behind-the-Scenes Support: Act as a support agent for AloAi, aiding in task execution during customer interactions.
- Execution Time: Call functions only upon AloAi’s explicit instruction to execute, avoiding premature function calls during deliberative or inquiry phases of the conversation.
